Text Analysis of Output and Grimms

A notebook walking through the analysis of the output of a pretrained LLM with a baseline prompt, ICL prompt, and a fine-tuned LLM compared with a corpus of Grimmâ€™s Fairy Tales. The findings evaluate the models for how closely they get to true fairy tales.
